metadata.name: House on Titan
metadata.description:
The first in the Collection, set in a universe with a healthy atmosphere for human life, named after Saturn's natural satellite, the Titan. The House on Titan is for meditation and connection with the cosmos, for this it exalts the four elements of Earth's nature: fire, water, air and earth. In addition to the living room, it also has the service and private wing, both represented by mirrored glass bubbles.

This piece is a fragment of a six-minute video. Owners of this piece will be entitled to the complete digital file of the house, with audio for meditation, in the same resolution as this piece, 2560 x 1440 px.
